data.message: I'm a rotten apple, but how'd the tree grow and who planted the seed though and whyd the worm choose me yo? That's a deep hole, so i rott and drop but when i hit the ground i sprang back up, a true rebirth tree fuck, it's funny how a tree just busted a nut, now i'm laughing at wood thats what's up, i was raised in hell so i dont need much... tree apple food water oxygen and paper to write on. Thanks Em
